publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2392 Elaine Thomson: Enough is Enough-That the Parliament congratulates the Enough is Enough group from Mastrick in Aberdeen, who were recently awarded the Emma Humphreys Memorial Prize for raising awareness of the fight for the protection of women and children from domestic abuse, and notes and applauds the extremely hard work which the group has put in over many years in campaigning to change the law in order to further protect women and children suffering from abuse which culminated in the Protection from Abuse (Scotland) Bill.
S1M-2392 Enough is Enough (lodged on 1 November 2001) Robin Harper*
S1M-2392 Enough is Enough (lodged on 1 November 2001) Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2392 Enough is Enough (lodged on 1 November 2001) Nora Radcliffe*, Johann Lamont*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mike Watson*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Margaret Jamieson*, Pauline McNeill*, Brian Adam*

S1M-2392 Enough is Enough (lodged on 1 November 2001) Dr Elaine Murray*, Hugh Henry*, Maureen Macmillan*
